titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on azoxystrobin formulated ("Heritage", "Abound", and "Quadris").

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/15/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2001, the duty on azoxystrobin formulated (Heritage, Abound, and Quadris).
